name: Curse Errant
description:
[Story]
Jizel traveled different lands as a mercenary knight.
Her next job is in the Shalun lands owned by the Mariole family,
and she heads outs with Lana the squire.

[Scenes]
40+ base scenes (+ costume variations)

There are pose arts that change with different outfits.

During some changing scenes and clothing rip from battle scenes,
the boobs will jiggle slightly.

Some scenes contain pre-belly (no birthing), lactating, and urinating themes

[System]
A turn-based battle system where the protagonist can continue attacking
as long as their TP (yellow gauge) continues.

The difficultly levels can be adjusted to your liking as well.

When the AP meter goes down, your clothing gets destroyed,
and you may end up receiving special ecchi attacks from enemies.
